page.title: 10SAWMILL
page.content: The sawmill has been on the {Abercairney Estate}for over 100 years. The first kind of power it used was a water wheel. Then it was driven by tractor and now is fully electric. The sawmill is open occasionally depending on the weather and it employs 2 people. The working hours are from 8 am to 5 pm. The workers get 6 weeks for holidays but do not usually take them as other jobs are offered when the mill is closed. Approximately{130 tons}of{Scots {Pine, Spruce}and{Larch}from the Estate are used per year. It is made into stobs or batters, firewood and is used for general repair work on the Estate. As little is sold, it is not a financially profitable part of the Estate.
